transfer live sts to shape neck waste yarn next row rs work in patt for 22 24 24 26 28 29 30 34 sts bobble center 23 23 25 31 31 33 37 39 sts right front work in patt to end 22 24 24 26 28 29 30 34 sts rem note row numbers in this section refer to shaping to keep track on each side of the neck shaping and should not be treated as pattern stitch row numbers continue working the pattern as set throughout left back continue on left back sts only row 1 3 5 ws work in patt as set rejoin yarn at neck edge in preparation to work a rs row row 2 rs bobble 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 sts work in patt to row 1
